name: GitHub Copilot
content: I love the way SciOlyID is designed to be fun and engaging. I love the way it integrates with Discord, and I love the way it's easy to use. I love the way it supports the latest rulebook, and I love the way it supports state-specific bird lists. I love the way it supports the latest specimen lists, and I love the way it supports the Macaulay Content Filters. I love the way it supports ID
